scripts.dev: npm run build:copy && npm run dev:sass & npm run dev:js
scripts.build:clean: rm -rf public && mkdir -p public/css public/js public/assets/images public/assets/icons
scripts.build:copy: cp src/index.html public/ && if [ -d src/assets ]; then cp -r src/assets/* public/assets/; fi
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:copy && npm run build:sass && npm run build:js
scripts.preview: npm run build && npm run serve
